UPDATE spplychain.inventory_data SET
QUANTITY = #{quantity},
PRODUCT = #{product},
WAREHOUSE = #{warehouse},
LAST_UPDATE_TIME=NOW() WHERE ID=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO spplychain.inventory_data (ID, QUANTITY, PRODUCT, WAREHOUSE, CREATE_TIME, LAST_UPDATE_TIME, VERSION) VALUES(#{id}, #{quantity}, #{product}, #{warehouse}, now(), now(), 1)
mapper.select: SELECT a.ID, a.QUANTITY, c.NAME product, a.CREATE_TIME, a.VERSION, b.NAME warehouse, a.last_update_time FROM spplychain.inventory_data a , spplychain.merchant_warehouse_data b,spplychain.product_data c WHERE a.WAREHOUSE = b.ID AND a.PRODUCT = c.ID AND a.ID = #{id}
